long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Broadcast message to discord channels

1) Get discord token https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YEgFvgg7ZPI

2) Set duration between each message being sent

3) Enter the message that u want to send

4) Input Format for Channel Name & Ids (channel name need to be unique)
ChannelName1,ChannelId1
ChannelName2,ChannelId2

5) Click Start

6) Complete status will be shown once completed
